title: Seal Labs AI Academy: Engineering Track
description: Interactive guide on using Claude Code for agentic workflows, covering Memory, Skills, Subagents, and Hooks.
author: Ellie

title: DRN Engineering Overview - Derivatives Risk Network
description: Premium recruitment page showcasing DRN's bilateral credit intermediation infrastructure for tokenized derivatives markets. Built for hiring founding engineers, featuring technical architecture, core systems breakdown, and team profiles.
author: Ellie

title: Research: AI Adoption & The 'Leapfrog' Effect
description: Analysis of how SEA youth use AI for economic survival (coding, freelancing) rather than just leisure. Highlights the 'Faceless Creator' economy using Midjourney/CapCut.
author: Ellie

title: Seal Labs AI Academy: Marketing Track
description: Guide on the 'No-Code to Low-Code' pipeline using Aura, Claude, and Google Apps Script for the 7K Mobile landing page.
author: Ellie
